title: Spinning hip hop culture toward tobacco free independenceIN: IN THE FIELD (10/15/15) (Afterschool Alliance)
text: ( Source : Afterschool Alliance ) Look out for a new targeted anti-smoking campaign for multicultural hip-hop youth, Fresh Empire . Organized by the Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ), the campaign focuses on the 4.4 million multicultural
